content: you ve just made a slip_stitch into or chain 3 if you find this too difficult round 12 - *bpdc in next st fpdc in next st repeat from * around slip_stitch into top of first st of round don t fo 50 fpdc 50 bpdc round 13 - *24 single_crochet increase in next st repeat from * around fo and make invisible join into second single_crochet of round 104 single_crochet sisters in stitch/ crochet road the fab5flower square �7 now to square her up take four stitch markers place a marker in any single_crochet *count 27 sts including initial marked st place marker repeat from * around this marks the four corner stitches begin this round with a standing 2trcl or you can replace the first 2trcl with chain 4 + treble_crochet in marked st round 14 - pearl - work this round in blo - * 2trcl chain 1 2trcl chain 2 2trcl chain 1 2trcl in marked cnr st chain 1 skip 1st 2htrcl chain 1 skip 1st 2dccl twice chain 1 skip 1st half_double_crochet chain 1 skip 1st single_crochet chain 1 skip 1st four times half_double_crochet chain 1 skip 1st 2dccl chain 1 skip 1st twice 2htrcl chain 1 skip 1st repeat from * around fo and make invisible join into top of first 2trcl 16 2trcls 8 2htrcl 16 2dccl 8 half_double_crochet 16 single_crochet 60 chain-1-sps 4 chain-2-sps begin this round with standing double_crochet in any cnr chain-2 space round 15 - pastel pink - *make the following in cnr chain-2-space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet fpdc in next st double_crochet in next chain-space twice fphdc in next st half_double_crochet in next chain-space twice fphdc in next st single_crochet in next chain-space fpsc in next st six times single_crochet in next chain-space fphdc in next st half_double_crochet in next chain-space twice fphdc in next st double_crochet in next chain- space fpdc in next st twice repeat from * on each side around fo and make invisible join into second single_crochet of round 35 st + 1 chain-2 space per side = total 140 sts 4 chain-2 sps sisters in stitch/ crochet road the fab5flower square �8 begin in any cnr with standing half_double_crochet round 16 - antique pink - *in cnr chain-2-space 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet bphdc in each st along side repeat from * on each side fo and make invisible join into second half_double_crochet of round 39 half_double_crochet per side 4 chain-1-sps lightly block your work and you are done well done i really hope you enjoyed this free pattern and that you found everything easy enough to follow i had a lot of fun designing this square with kay ahnem s fab5flower kay & tess sisters in stitch and myself would all love to see your finished squares please post any pics you take on your ig or fb page if you have one add one or more of the following tags so we can see your lovely work
